event.name: Al Saheel - A 1001 Horse Tales

event.name: Vista Rooftop Bar & Restaurant
event.description: Treat your hard-working mums to a fabulous dinner she will eat for free! Special Mother’s Day menu featuring our delightful Roast chicken carved at the table with all the scrummy trimmings. Booking is a must. Also get a chance to pamper you mum as ALL Mother’s dining will also receive a 20% discount voucher for Chill Spa Dubai

event.name: Vista Rooftop Bar & Restaurant
event.description: Steak and Guinness Pie or Irish stew with a pint of Guinness and an Irish Coffee for only Dhs99! For those that fancy a purely liquid dinner we will be offering: buy 1 get 1 free Guinness and select bottled beers all night long as well as 3 for 2 cocktails and shooters to get your lucky charms swinging

event.name: Vista Rooftop Bar & Restaurant
